Charging the car with my Zappi is a nightmare! Octopus Intelligent Go is simply unsustainable, and Octopus Go extremely temperamental! The Zappi has even been replaced and works fine, and there is nothing inherently wrong with my power supply, or Octopus. My excellent local dealer has had the car in, and apparently there is no fault in the charging system. However, the same charger and setup previously worked perfectly with two other EVs from Mazda and Omoda respectively. So WHERE's the problem?

This is a CRITICAL fix for the "Please Log In on Phone" issue that kills the app. The solution came from the Mach-E forum: 1. Delete all Ford app data on the watch. 2. Uninstall the watch app. 3. Crucially: Factory reset the watch, and DO NOT restore from a backup. Set it up as new. 4. Reinstall the Ford app on the watch. 5. Open the Ford app on your phone first, then on the watch. Setting up the watch without a backup is key!
